<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974102</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Schools Demining Schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schulen Demining Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoles de Demining D'Écoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolas De Demining Das Escolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuole Di Demining Delle Scuole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολεία σχολικής αποναρκοθέτητης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuelas De Demining De las Escuelas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Land mines are silent, secret weapons. They have been placed in over 60 countries around the world. In this web site, you can learn about these dangerous weapons and how you can help make the world safe from land mines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landgruben sind leise, geheime Waffen. Sie 
sind innen über 60 Länder um die Welt plaziert worden. In 
dieser Web site können Sie über diese gefährlichen Waffen erlernen 
und wie Sie helfen können, das Weltsafe von den Landgruben zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les mines de terre sont les armes silencieuses et 
secrètes. Elles ont été placées dans plus de 60 pays autour 
du monde. Dans ce site Web, vous pouvez vous renseigner sur ces 
armes dangereuses et comment vous pouvez aider à faire le coffre-fort
du monde à partir des mines de terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As minas da terra são armas silenciosas, 
secretas. Foram colocados dentro sobre 60 países em torno do 
mundo. Neste Web site, você pode aprender sobre estas armas 
perigosas e como você pode ajudar fazer o cofre do mundo das minas da
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le miniere della terra sono armi silenziose e 
segrete. Sono state disposte dentro oltre 60 paesi intorno al 
mondo. In questo Web site, potete imparare circa queste armi 
pericolose e come potete contribuire a fare la cassaforte del mondo 
dalle miniere della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ορυχεία εδάφους είναι σιωπηλά, μυστικά όπλα. 
Έχουν τοποθετηθεί σε πάνω από 60 χώρες σε όλο τον 
κόσμο. Σε αυτόν τον ιστοχώρο, μπορείτε να μάθετε για αυτά 
τα επικίνδυνα όπλα και πώς μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε να κάνετε το 
παγκόσμιο χρηματοκιβώτιο από τα ορυχεία εδάφους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las minas de la pista son armas silenciosas, 
secretas. Se han colocado adentro sobre 60 países alrededor del
mundo. En este Web site, usted puede aprender sobre estas armas 
peligrosas y cómo usted puede ayudar a hacer la caja fuerte del mundo
de minas de la pista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974102</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="en">Custom License</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106506</entry>
